label: We live in a moment of history where change is so speeded up that we begin to see the present only when it is already disappearing.

label: Love does not claim possession, but gives freedom.

label: Facts are many, but the truth is one.

label: We come nearest to the great when we are great in humility.

label: Art is not living. It is the use of living.

label: Music fills the infinite between two souls.

label: In Art, man reveals himself and not his objects.

label: A lot happens by accident in poetry.

label: War itself is the enemy of the human race.

label: Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.

label: When people don't understand that the government doesn't have their interests in mind, they're more susceptible to go to war.

label: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.

label: One had to take some action against fear when once it laid hold of one.

label: Education is all a matter of building bridges.

label: The purpose of all war is peace.

label: Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and mankind the vessel.

label: The faith that stands on authority is not faith.

label: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.

label: Science does not know its debt to imagination.

label: For me concrete poetry was a particular way of using language which came out of a particular feeling, and I don't have control over whether this feeling is in me or not.

label: Imagination is the only key to the future. Without it none exists - with it all things are possible.

label: Lesser artists borrow, great artists steal.

label: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.

label: Nature and books belong to the eyes that see them.

label: In our culture we have such respect for musical instruments, they are like part of God.

label: To be afraid is to behave as if the truth were not true.
